item.title: Zedd,Grey,Maren Morris - The Middle
item.description:
작곡: Zedd, Jorda.., Sarah Aarons / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 91164 / KY: 23145

Take
a seat
Right over there
sat on the stairs
Stay
or leave
The cabinets are bare
and I’m unaware
Of just how we got
into this mess
Got
so aggressive
I know we meant
all good intentions
So pull me
closer
Why don’t you
pull me close
Why don’t you
come on over
I can’t just
let you go
Oh baby
why don’t you
Just meet me
in the middle
I’m losing my mind
just a little
So why don’t you
just meet me
In the middle
in the middle

why don’t you
Just meet me
in the middle

just a little

just meet me
In the middle
in the middle

a step
Back for a minute
into the kitchen
Floors are
wet
And taps are still
running
Dishes are
broken
How did we get
into this mess
Got
so aggressive
I know we meant
all good intentions
So pull me
closer

pull me close

come on over

why don’t you

in the middle

just a little

just meet me

in the middle

I can’t lie

admission

my objection
And it’s not
about my pride
I need you
on my skin just
Come over
pull me in just

just a little
